subject: Attn: Lisa
body:
I'm Samer Solh a Board Member with Bahamdan Group, an investment company based in Saudi Arabia & Dubai, UAE. 



Bahamdan Group is a pioneering global investor that manages a private investment portfolio and re-invests the same through a globally diversified investment.



Our offer for investment is based on a purely loan/debt financing basis of 1.5% interest rate annually and throughout the duration of the collaboration.



I look forward to reading from you about projects and possible collaborations: mailto:info@bahamdangroup.ae



Waiting for your kind response.



Allah Blessings,



Samer Solh - Board Member /

Chief Investment Officer

Bahamdan Group Management

Address: Airport Road, Qurtubah,

Riyadh 13244, Saudi Arabia

Web: http://www.bahamdangroup.ae

Tel: +49 1577 8670 382 / Whatsaap

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Hello Samer Solh,

Thank you for reaching out and introducing yourself. It's a pleasure to meet you. The Bahamdan Group sounds like a very impressive organization.

I'm intrigued by your offer of investment based on loan debt financing. Could you please provide more details about this? What kind of projects or businesses does the Bahamdan Group typically invest in? And what is the usual duration of these investments?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Dear Lisa,



As-Salaam-Alaikum. Greetings from Bahamdan Group and thank you for earlier contact with us.



We confirm receiving your business proposal and we assure you that Bahamdan Group will look into this and revert back soonest.



Let me use this medium to throw more light on our mission, Bahamdan Group Management guarantee 100% to provide financing for your project in your country. But before detailing you of their terms and conditions, it is quite proper to introduce the company.



Bahamdan Investment Authority is an effective  Saudi Arabia finance service company that has assisted many businessmen, Middle East businessmen, Europeans, Americans, Africans, Small and Medium Enterprise to grow their investments and to make good profitable margins annually. Therefore the portfolio for you to be part of this fast growing financial group is for your good. For sure Bahamdan Group Management can finance your project from the start to finish. Repayment starts after project is built up within the range as will be stated in their agreement and interest within that range period is normally added to the principal.



Bahamdan Investment Authority is open to your project(s). The portfolio consists of diversified services which includes investment and desire to lunch out loans to interested managers who can make returns as at when due. Bahamdan Management are capable to grant Loan between the ranges of US$1 Million to US$25 Billion.



Note that Bahamdan Management will not be able to monitor the progressing of the investment so for this reason, Bahamdan Management prefers to loan you the funds to invest in the project as the sole proprietor and return to Bahamdan Group 1.5% interest rate annually for 5-10 years or more.



However, as part of our procedure for consideration of project for possible funding, we will expect to receive your project's general presentation in the form of a comprehensive business plan in a compatible format (PDF-recommended) for our review and consideration.



It is compulsory that clients send to us an elaborate breakdown of the project for our review and approval. If the project as presented is acceptable and within our scope of funding, we shall thus make an offer on a very clear and precise terms.



We expect project presentation/Business plan to be able to cover the following functional areas:



The structure or an Introduction of the project owner/initiator



- Historical evaluation of business plan

- Financial structure and analysis to support the investment plan and proposition as presented.



Welcome to the world of opportunities.



This is thanking you as I anticipate to establish a lasting and profitable business relationship with you.
Regards,

Samer Solh - Board Member /

Chief Investment Officer

Bahamdan Group Management

Address: Airport Road, Qurtubah,

Riyadh 13244, Saudi Arabia

Web: http://www.bahamdangroup.ae/

Tel: +49 1577 8670 382 / Whatsaap

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Hello Samer Solh,

Thank you for your detailed response and the introduction to Bahamdan Group Management. It's great to hear about the work you've done in assisting various enterprises across different continents.

I'm intrigued by the financing options you've mentioned, especially the range of loans that Bahamdan Group can provide. It sounds like a wonderful opportunity for businesses looking for financial support.

Could you please elaborate more on the repayment terms? You mentioned that repayment starts after the project is built up within a certain range. Could you clarify what this range is?

Also, I'm curious about the interest rate that would be added to the principal. Is it a fixed rate or does it vary depending on certain factors?

Regarding my project's business plan, I will certainly prepare it with all necessary details covering functional areas as per your guidelines. However, could you specify what format would be compatible for your review?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body: However, as part of our procedure for consideration of project for possible funding, we will expect to receive your project's general presentation in the form of a comprehensive business plan in a compatible format (PDF-recommended) for our review and consideration.

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and considering my project for possible funding. I'm thrilled to hear that you're interested in learning more about it. 

Could you please specify what kind of information you would like to see in the business plan? Also, could you clarify what format would be most compatible for your review process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
we will expect to receive your project's general 

presentation in the form of a comprehensive business plan in a

compatible format (PDF-recommended)

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite interested in your project and would love to learn more about it. Could you please provide some more details? What is the main objective of this project? And what kind of business plan format are you referring to?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body: We are anticipating to receive your business summary.

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Hello there! 

I'm thrilled to hear that you're interested in my business summary. Could you please tell me more about what specific information you're looking for? I'd be happy to provide any general details about the business, its operations, and goals.

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm quite interested in learning more about your business. Could you please provide me with a brief summary of what your business entails? What are the main products or services that you offer? And how long have you been operating?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body: If you do not have a business plan or a project summary resist from asking me questions of the information which was already related to you we have already given you the background details about our functions you are anticipated to submit your project summary or a business plan for our review we need to know on what area and the kind of business you want to reinvest the money and how much longer are you looking for.

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the information you've shared about your functions. It's really interesting! 

I'm just a bit confused about the project summary or business plan you're asking for. Could you please elaborate more on what exactly you need in these? What specific details should be included? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "how much longer are you looking for"? Are we talking about a time frame here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Lisa

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body: You are required to make a formal breakdown of the business how much you intend to invest in your business how much profit you get when do you intend to return the loan how much loan are you looking for you have to prepare this in a compiled to find as a business plan or project summary I will not talk about this again if you don't know what business plan or project somebody required you have to make research and don't ask me to write a business plan for you.

subject: Re: Attn: Lisa
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the detailed information you've provided about the business plan and project summary. It's clear that these are important aspects of any successful business venture.

I'm curious, could you perhaps share some more insights on how to effectively compile a business plan? I understand it's not your responsibility to write one for me, but any tips or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Also, in terms of investment, what range do you typically see from businesses? Is there a common profit margin that most businesses aim for?

Lastly, regarding the loan repayment schedule, is there a standard timeline that most businesses follow or does it vary depending on the specific circumstances of each business?

Again, thank you for your time and expertise. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Lisa
